secondSection.title: What are you struggling with?
secondSection.subtitle: Perhaps you can find yourself in one of these places
secondSection.text: Depression, finances, relationship issues, loneliness, bullying, grief, anger, abuse, fear, anxiety...

about.title: About Us
about.text: We are people just like you. We also struggle. We also face issues. We know how things can so easily slip away from what we wish they were.
about.text2: But still, we set up this website to be here for you when you came so that you could know that Jesus sees you right where you are and has a new life for you...
